feed.title: Combined summary - BIP proposal -- wallet extensions

entry.title: Combined summary - BIP proposal -- wallet extensions
entry.summary: There is a proposal for extensions based on bip44 conventions that is currently being developed. One of the most interesting aspects of this proposal is fully deterministic GPG keys. The proposal can be found on Github at https://github.com/taelfrinn/bip44extention. The author is open to any comments or interest regarding the proposal.
